Invocation Name: smart camera
des:
Camhi PTZ skill for Amazon Alexa, you can now Controls the PTZ rotation of the device and turns on or off the device's motion detection function by voice. 

This skill needs to be used in conjunction with the Camhi Camera skill.To get started, please enable Camhi Camera skill,then select the 'Enable Skill' button to link your CamhiExt account . 

When using the skill, you will need to use Camhi Camera skill has been found under the device name . Once you know the name for your devices, you can give commands such as:

"Alexa, ask smart camera for turn up kitchen"
"Alexa,ask smart camera for turn down kitchen"
"Alexa,ask smart camera for turn left kitchen"
"Alexa,ask smart camera for turn right kitchen"
These commands control the PTZ rotation of the device.

"Alexa,ask smart camera for turn on kitchen"
"Alexa,ask smart camera for turn off kitchen"
These commands control the ability to turn the device's motion detection on or off.

To use this Skill, you need to specify the name of the desired camera, which can be found and configured in the CamhiExt app.
